column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Jinora says : " I will make no such promises . "
#Text=Korra says : " I did n't miss your match , did I ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Hasook 's a no - good no - show !
#Text=" Referee says : " You got two minutes to come out ready to play , or you 're disqualified .
#Text=" Mako says : " Well , there goes our shot at the tournament ... and the winnings .
#Text=" Korra says : " Ca n't you ask one of those guys to fill in ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Nah .
#Text=The rules say you can only compete on one team .
#Text=" Korra says : " Well , then ... how about me ?
#Text=I 'm a top - notch waterbender , if I do say so myself .
#Text=" Bolin says : " But , you 're the Avatar .
#Text=Is n't that cheating ?
#Text=" Korra says : " It is n't cheating if I only do waterbending .
#Text=" Mako says : " No way .
#Text=I 'd rather forfeit than look like a fool out there .
#Text=" Korra says : " Wow , thanks for the vote of confidence .
#Text=" Referee says : " Time 's up .
#Text=You in or out ?
#Text=" Korra says : " We 're in !
#Text=" Mako says : " We are ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Yes !
#Text=" Mako says : " Hey , I did n't agree to this !
#Text=" Korra says : " You can thank me later .
#Text=" Mako says : " This girl is crazy .
#Text="
